attributes.action: The leave campaign misled voters - declare the result void
attributes.additional_details:
Immigration
Hannan (leave MEP): "We never said there was going to be some radical decline [in immigration] ... we want a measure of control. 
(see: Newsnight interview: http://snpy.tv/28XbbYx)

£350m to NHS
Asked by ITV's Good Morning Britain whether he could guarantee that the £350m that was sent to the EU would now go the NHS, Mr Farage said: “No I can’t, I would never have made that claim. That was one of the mistakes made by the Leave campaign.”
attributes.background:
The leave campaign made a number of claims during the campaign, which they have now admitted were false. This misled voters. Therefore, the result should be declared null and void. 

If a business couldn't do it in an advert, why can they? 
(see ASA: https://goo.gl/Zkajy9)

rejection.details: Apologies, the link we previously sent was incorrect. We cannot accept the petition that you submitted as it is very similar to the following petition: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/139789
